歮字的基本解释

歮
sè
古同“涩”。

歮字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sè］
［《廣韻》色立切，入緝，生。］
亦作“歮1”。亦作“澁1”。亦作“濇1”。亦作“瀒1”。“泣3”的被通假字。“涩1”的繁体字。
(1)不光滑；不灵活；不滑润。
(2)味不甘滑，像明矾或不熟的杮子那样使舌头感到麻木干燥的味道。
(3)说话、写文章迟钝、艰难、生硬，不流畅。
(4)道路险阻；不通畅。
(5)生锈。
(6)急。

歮字的康熙字典解释

【辰集下】【止字部】　歮； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页576第38
【字彙補】與澀同。【漢·犍爲楊君頌】?路歮難。

歮字的起名意思

古同“涩”。

Sorrow
Basic explanation of words
Sorrow
sè
The ancients are "astringent".
Sorrow
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [sè]
["Guangyun" is a sharp cut, seized, and born. ]
Also known as "歮1". Also known as "澁1". Also known as "Yi 1". Also known as "Yuan 1". "Cry 3" was passed falsely. Traditional characters for "Sute 1".
(1) Not smooth; not flexible; not slippery.
(2) The taste is unsatisfactory and makes the tongue feel numb and dry like alum or unripe burrito.
(3) Speaking and writing articles are slow, difficult, blunt, and not fluent.
(4) The road is dangerous; it is not clear.
(5) Rust.
(6) Urgent.
Sorrow
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Jixia] [Zhizi Department] 　歮; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 576 38
【Word Supplement】Same as Shibuya. 【Han·Qianwei Yang Jun Song】? The road is difficult.
